body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Additional Education Resources                Additional Education Resources        The variety of resources available to teachers and students is almost overwhelming. NPS photo         NPS photo  Web Resources Explore our useful listing of resources available on the internet to support your teaching.         NPS photo  Photos and Multimedia Find resources that will assist you in teaching your students about the birthplace of America.  Looking for the sound of the Liberty Bell?  Find it here!        NPS photo  Brochures and Activity Sheets Make your visit to the park more productive with these tools.
title: Independence National Historical Park: Additional Education Resources
